name: DigDig
description:
Game made for 72 jam (HeartBeast-Jam).

   The Humans are destroying nature to create more buildings which are making moles hungrier. It gets harder for them to find a new place with more food. Dig Dig and Dig to run away and eat all the food before its too late.

Controls: 
     Mouse Left Click :      Dig

     Escape button :          Quit Game
